deploy.startCommand: /bin/sh -c "MODE=${RAILWAY_RUNTIME_MODE:-web}; if [ \"$MODE\" = \"cron\" ]; then echo 'Runtime mode: cron'; python -m app.cron_check_plans; elif [ \"$MODE\" = \"worker\" ]; then echo 'Runtime mode: worker'; python -m app.worker_daemon; else echo 'Runtime mode: web'; if [ \"${RUN_MIGRATIONS_ON_STARTUP:-0}\" = \"1\" ]; then echo 'Running migrations...' && alembic upgrade head || echo 'Migration failed, continuing startup'; fi; python -m uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port $PORT; fi"
